@TimothyJones75 We are afraid not. Transit port for all our flights are in Hong Kong only as we are Hong Kong base company. If there is any changes for your flight, we will notify you via email / SMS. You can register notiFly message on https://t.co/ookjuE0psE  - Anna

@DRichHK It is valid. We offer unlimited free changes for new tickets issued with us online between 9 Mar and 20 Apr.
You can DM us if you have further enquiries. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRkR51

@emilybobasaur We recommend you to check with the frequent flyer program directly if different program may have different guidelines/policy. If you issue ticket with Asia Miles, you may contact Asia Miles for assistance. -Vinci

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text:
@Zelham If your booking is made with a travel agent, you will have to contact them for assistance as we are unable to handle any agent bookings.
If you book with us directly, you may login to "Manage Booking" via https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr to rebook your flight. (2/3)

@Zelham If you booked on or before 4 Feb 2020 for travel until 31 May 2020 for any ticket to / from / via Hong Kong, you can change your booking with no rebooking or rerouting fees, yet fare / tax difference would apply. The new travel date must be on or before 10 December 2020. (1/3)

entity.name: South Korea slams Japan's decision to quarantine visitors from the country as 'unreasonable'
entity.description: South Korea protested a decision by Japan to quarantine arrivals from the country for two weeks at designated sites, calling it "unreasonable, excessive and extremely regrettable." There are currently more than 6,200 cases of COVID–19 in South Korea.
